metadata.Title: CVE-2014-6070 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Adiscon LogAnalyzerbefore 3.6.6 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTMLvia the hostname in (1) index.php or (2) detail.php.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-6070` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

loganalyzer - 3.6.6+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: loganalyzer package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.6.6+dfsg-1').
